Articles.Content:
Ladies and Gentlemen, I am pleased to present the Batwing. 

Long story short, I saw a model of this particular aircraft at a friend's, and thought it would be cool to make it in KSP. Its a really fun aircraft to fly, and I hope everyone enjoys it! Also, here's a video of it, if you care:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZJXwF40-CcI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

![7MSNIng.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/7MSNIng.jpg)

Requires KW rocketry and BD armory. Action group 1 toggles the machine guns on and off. 

Here's the file: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/pbemyc5vpqun9wz/Batwing.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/pbemyc5vpqun9wz/Batwing.craft?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-24T17:33:57Z" title="03/24/2015 05:33  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 24, 2015</time> by CattleProdGod**
  
making pictures work
NaNaNaNaNa no pics no clicks! joke apart upload some screenshoots on imgur then post here the images (you can take screenshots by pressing F1 in game)
There we go! Sorry, I apparently screwed up the first time, I thought I had some pics included...

Oh no, it's the NaN bug ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

EDIT: It's infected the forums too.
